items.title: Mobile Marketing: Cash In On The Mobile Marketing Revolution
items.headline: Learn how to create high converting mobile apps to start capturing market share.
objectives_summary: You'll learn how to create high converting mobile apps or outsource their creation to start capturing market share.
You'll learn how to properly market your mobile apps and you'll learn about QR codes and how to use them to drive traffic to your website.
You'll learn how to utilize text message marketing in your mobile campaigns, and we'll touch on some of the best services to help you get there.

Learn what you need to have in place to request that YouTube pay you money and how to get their agreement more quickly.
Find out the basics you need in the early days of your channel so that you're not spending a lot of money up front.
